CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(DMAPP__Has_Relationship_Map__c), '1. No Relationship Map', IF (DMAPP__Account_Political_Map__r.Altify_KP_Count__c < 4, '2. <4 Key Players', IF (DMAPP__Account_Political_Map__r.Altify_Has_KP_Contact_OK__c, '4. >=4KPs, Contact level Ok', '3. >=4KPs, Contact level not Ok')))
CustomField.label: Relationship Map Key Player Status
